description:
As an admin user of the Endabank,
              I want to be able to approve or disapprove an account,
     So that only allowed users will be able to sign into the application
name: Admin Accounts Approval

elements.name: Deactivate an account under admin approval

steps.name: the user is logged in as an 'Admin' user
the user is on the Admin Panel section
the user toggles to 'Deactivate' an account under review

elements.name: Non-admin user can't see the user approval section

steps.name: the user is logged in as an 'NormalUser' user
the user tries to enter in the approval section
tries to enter trough the url 'http://medellin-med.uc.r.appspot.com/activate-account' its redirected to home
